site_name: Development Site at former Dukes Lodge, Holland Park, LONDON, W11
description: Details required by Condition 11 (Energy Compliance Certificate) of planning application PP/19/01283 (Variation of condition 2 (compliance with approved drawings) of planning permission 18/01424 to allow replacement of 4no. double-door entrances with single-door entrances with fixed glazed sidelights, changes to the heights of boundary walls, with addition of stone coping; alterations to 2nd floor windows including change of materials used; retention of projecting central balcony at 3rd floor; replacement of ceramic fins with integral fin-like glazing bars on front elevation; incorporation of 1no. new window (and possibly 1no. solid door) in north elevation; removal of winter gardens and glazing from rear elevation; no reduction in size of kitchen windows, with possible addition of window surrounds; and, clarification of method to be used to introduce dark stone between ground/1st floor bays and second floor bays)
